name: U-Zyn Chua
body:
I am a blockchain developer.

Passionate about decentralization, especially:

- Ethereum
- Bitcoin
- Cryptocurrency
- Security
- JavaScript
- Decentralized apps (dapp) and systems

I am open for opportunities or consultations on any of the above.

## Contacts

- Email: chua@uzyn.com
- GitHub: @uzyn
- Twitter: [@uzyn](https://twitter.com/uzyn)
- LinkedIn: [uzynchua](https://www.linkedin.com/in/uzynchua)
- Talks: [at SpeakerDeck](https://speakerdeck.com/uzyn)
- Freenode IRC handle: uzyn. I usually hang out at #hackerspacesg, #ethereum, #bitcoin, #webuildsg, #opauth.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
